name: Roll your spells
description:
Teaser :

After being banished to hell for the sin of gambling, you return to earth to prove that randomness is on your side!

Walk the tower, room after room, uncertain of the nature of your spell.

The crew :

Producer/Game Designer/Pixel Artist : Louis Farcy

Développer : Thomas Lombard

Développer :  Nicolas Brouet

Character Designer : Simon

Sound Designer : Hâche
